author: Mark Kennedy
comment: Works perfectly. People need to stop complaining about the ads. Pay the very small fee to get rid of the ads, it's as easy as that. Also, several people say they shouldn't have to pay becsuse they paid for the TV. That makes no sense, Samsung didn't make the app 🙄

If I was sure that the payment to remove ads was onetime only, it would be definitely worth it, but they say "Subscribe" and for paying that monthly it is not worth at all... I was not able to find anywhere the information about the payment - one time only or periodic...? Does anyone know?
I paid for a Samsung tv. The remotes are built so thin they break. And I have to deal with ads to use it? I think we should be able to use it regardless. We obviously all paid for the Samsung TV

author: somebody special
comment: I've used other apps that I'd have to sync every time I'd use it & the ads took over my phone!!  Soo frustrating however this app has to ''find tv'' ads are there not too bad. Easy, to use so makes my life lots easier!!

author: Bethsua Calleros
comment: It too took long to connect with my tv. Everytime I leave the app and need to go back in, I have to wait until it connects again before I can use it. It has so many ads and once the ad is done and I dismiss the ad, the app closes and I have to wait for it to connect again. I pray another ad doesn't appear. I did not like this app.

author: Jim Mc
comment: Paid app is well worth it, thanks for finally adding it.  Our youngest threw away our remote and we installed this as a temporary measure.  Once we realized how much less TV the kids watched when they no longer had control of the remote, we stuck with the app.  Probably the best .99 cents I've ever spent.  Thanks!

author: Pipo
comment: Works fine for me. I don't understand how some people expect it to turn on their TV when it operates over wifi. Both products have to connect to the same wifi network for it to work. Just turn the TV on manually then the remote will do rest.

author: David Bradley
comment: It worked a few months ago now it won't detect my TV. I can use screen mirroring fine. Sad I have a Samsung note 8 and it won't connect to this remote app. Not sure what happened and why it doesn't connect.

author: David Stutz
comment: Does what's needed. Just bought a new 55 in 4k smart tv and It allows me to access everything so idk how the rating got a 3.8 honestly. Prolly trolls

author: boui
comment: Jam packed with ads. Everytime you open it there will be at least one or two full screen ads,some of them automatically playing sound, which is particularly annoying. They prevent you from using the remote as soon as possible. It functions as it should, otherwise. I would rate much higher if there wasnt such intrusive ads. Consider banner ads.

author: Faraz Ahmed Qureshi
comment: I dont comment or post reviews for any app but this app has made me so. Worst app with so many ads. Seems like the developer is earning from this only app. Now installed Peel Remote with better options and no ads.

author: N Kilic
comment: I don't rate apps but because of the ad amount being way too much and annoying as heck, i gave a feedback. The app scans For tv every time  you open it,  even if its running in the background and even if its in the notifications. With that every time there is a full page ad you gotta wait a bit to be able to close it. Also constant banner ad below remote which thats fine but scanning for tv eveytime you switch an app and  getting an ad pop up EVERYTIME For what its worth, its  NOT worth it.  The app works most of the time but not hundred percent. In the handful of times i used it, few times got the ad but no tv found, had to kill the app and restart app, then got the ad again and found tv. Smart hub/ home button doesn't seem to work either. Look for another app. When you need to use the app quickly like to mute the tv, it will take you about 20 seconds to the remote after scanning and ads. Redicoulous!

author: x put gage in a cage
comment: Terrible because I can't go 20 seconds without getting an ad and every time I exit the ad it kicks me out and then when I get back on it it doesn't load so i have to exit again just for it to load up and then there's a 90% chance I get an ad that kicks me out even worse I get ads on top of ads and when I exit some times it gives me ads and takes me back to the app

author: Alex Sutton
comment: The app works but the adds make it annoyingly unusable. Click the back by accident and you have to watch another advert!

author: Bogdan Rusu
comment: The amount of spam is insane. Each action brings a 5 second spam junk commercial. Useless in this condition.

author: Thomas Barnes
comment: Worked exactly as stated but wish they would remove the beginning advertisement and just go straight to the remote....and instead make the ad. a box under the remote....also have the capability to name and lock in the tv code for multiple TVs so it does not have to search every time the program or phone enters sleep mode....otherwise great App....

author: Jacob Maurizio
comment: Works well. Alot of ads but that comes with a free app. My main problem is that it drains my battery heavily making me force stop it everytime I'm done.

author: Bret Wery
comment: Dumb app, I had to watch a 15 second ad before I could use it. I'll find a better one

author: Dean Leedham
comment: Love this little app... it comes in useful for those times when you just can't find your own remote 😉 Is even better when winding mates up when keep on switching their tvs off lol

author: Blair Smith
comment: I have a Samsung TV and a Samsung phone and nothing works, even with manual IP put in. Inexcusable.

author: Miranda Marshall
comment: Almost perfect! But the Back button does not work properly which is kind of a big deal for navigating smart tv apps. Can't find my actual remote so a non-functional back button means I had to download another remote app. Everything else is better on this app than any of the others I've downloaded.

author: Paul Muntean
comment: Good app. My remote died on me so with this app i can do the same tasks as with a regular remote

author: Kayte Anderson
comment: Works perfect for my older Samsung plasma!! But OMG way too many ads

author: Matthew Vela
comment: I like the app just wish it could labled which tv your connected too. I have multiple Samsung smart tv in my house and it sometimes connects to other devices when I'm simply trying to connect to the one im standing right in front of.

author: Danny Melvin
comment: I could put up with the ads when it first opens, but once you switch apps and try to get it back, it gets stuck in "Search TV". 😡

author: Sterling Smith
comment: Great app if you enjoy 5 second ads every 10 seconds. Otherwise not worth downloading.

author: Colin Kennedy
comment: Hey Samsung, I bought your TV, do not use the app to use your TV as a way to send me advertisements. I will never use this app again and will make sure everyone I ever meet knows this. This makes me want to never buy a Samsung TV ever again

author: Tyler Scheuch
comment: Waaaay too many ads. I got blasted with a video ad before even getting to check out the app.
I like this  app help  me  turn  off  my TV when  I cannot  find  my remote  control

author: james taylor
comment: All the options I need. Can be a bit slow but could be dwn 2 network

author: Matthew Ricketts
comment: Seems to work very well so far. Only down side is the adverts but it's free so what do you expect?

author: mahantesh h
comment: Best for basic features.. best and cheap replacement if you loose/damage your tv remote

author: A Fisher
comment: The remote works, but it takes a long time to load and too many ads.

author: Lucas Milligan
comment: my brother threw my remote I can,t find it

author: Miguel Bahena
comment: Not a good app. Could never get to to work

author: Tony Crimando
comment: First of all it wouldn't bring me here to rate it unless I gave it 5 stars. Second it picks up my tv maybe 50% of the time.

author: ashley peters
comment: Horrible app too many ads and when u click no on an ad u exit the app

author: Ricardo Ortiz
comment: Ads don't like but other then that it is a realy good app.

author: crazy cat lady
comment: There is no point you need to have a normal remote for this remote to work

author: Instincts Over all
comment: Not reliable but for the most part it works on my Samsung tv.
